text: Yemwe abemeye! Mujye mwirinda kenshi gukeka (bagenzi banyu), kuko rimwe na rimwe gukeka ari icyaha. Kandi ntimukanekane cyangwa ngo musebanye. Ese umwe muri mwe yakwemera kurya inyama y’umuvandimwe we wapfuye? (Ntawabyemera!) Ngaho nimubireke kandi mugandukire Allah. Mu by’ ukuri, Allah ni Uwakira bihebuje ukwicuza, Nyirimbabazi
